title: Charging issue / Backup issue / Play services issue
content:
Issue 1:
Phone won't charge with standard Pixel USB Cable charger (tried mine and my Fiancees, she has a pixel 3). Used fiancees after market charger and surprisingly worked. 

Issue 2: 
Tried to backup phone so I can reset to factory and getting waiting to backup for over a day now. No other option to backup unless i use 3rd party software?? 

Issue 3:
Tried contacting Google support by going to Options > Tips & Support but Google Play services crashes everytime I selected. No phone number?

Beyond frustrated with this phone and Google. Whats next?
